validCombinations.description: Psychologically balanced personality profile with moderate traits
validCombinations.psychologicalNotes: Well-balanced profile following normal distribution patterns

validCombinations.description: High conscientiousness with low neuroticism - classic achiever pattern
validCombinations.psychologicalNotes: Research-backed combination: high C with low N correlates r≈-0.5

validCombinations.description: High openness with moderate extraversion - creative but introspective
validCombinations.psychologicalNotes: Common pattern in creative individuals - high openness with lower extraversion

validCombinations.description: High agreeableness with high extraversion - socially warm personality
validCombinations.psychologicalNotes: Positive correlation between agreeableness and extraversion r≈0.3

validCombinations.description: Low neuroticism with moderate openness - emotionally stable traditional type
validCombinations.psychologicalNotes: Traditional personality with strong emotional stability

invalidCombinations.description: Very high neuroticism with very low conscientiousness - psychologically improbable
invalidCombinations.psychologicalNotes: Extreme neuroticism usually correlates with higher conscientiousness as coping mechanism

invalidCombinations.description: Very low agreeableness with very high extraversion - contradictory social pattern
invalidCombinations.psychologicalNotes: High extraversion typically correlates with moderate to high agreeableness

invalidCombinations.description: All traits extremely high - statistically improbable combination
invalidCombinations.psychologicalNotes: Probability of all traits >90th percentile is <0.001% in population

invalidCombinations.description: All traits extremely low - indicates possible data entry error
invalidCombinations.psychologicalNotes: Probability of all traits <10th percentile suggests measurement error

invalidCombinations.description: Maximum conscientiousness with maximum neuroticism - self-defeating pattern
invalidCombinations.psychologicalNotes: Extreme perfectionism combined with extreme anxiety creates unsustainable psychological tension

edgeCases.description: Traits at exact boundaries of validity
edgeCases.psychologicalNotes: Extreme values at boundaries should trigger review but not rejection

edgeCases.description: Testing decimal precision limits (2 decimal places)
edgeCases.psychologicalNotes: Maximum allowed precision should be exactly 2 decimal places

edgeCases.description: Personality pattern inappropriate for young adult (18-25)
edgeCases.psychologicalNotes: Very high conscientiousness and very low neuroticism uncommon in young adults

businessRuleViolations.description: Personality pattern incompatible with corporate agent roles
businessRuleViolations.businessRuleNotes: Corporate agents require minimum conscientiousness 50, maximum neuroticism 60

businessRuleViolations.description: Personality unsuitable for customer service agent roles
businessRuleViolations.businessRuleNotes: Customer service agents require minimum extraversion 40, agreeableness 60

culturalConsiderations.description: Personality pattern appropriate for collectivist cultural context
culturalConsiderations.culturalNotes: High agreeableness and moderate extraversion typical in collectivist cultures

culturalConsiderations.description: Extreme individualist pattern may need cultural sensitivity review
culturalConsiderations.culturalNotes: Very low agreeableness may be problematic in team-oriented environments
